attributes.action: Ban restricted vehichle from overtaking on dual carriageways and motorways
attributes.additional_details:
ALL Restricted vehicles (vehicles that have max speed limit below 70mph) such as LGV's, Coaches and towing vehicles cause congestion and are a road safety threat when overtaking.  We have all seen a HGV struggling to over take another one who is doing its 56mph limit, this then blocks and slows the faster lane/s then to suddenly swerve back in front, nearly causing an accident.
Germany has this policy and it will make our multilaned, high speed roads safer and less congested.
